description:
The Zanpakuto notice the remaining Sword Beasts acting strangely and realize it to be the work of Kirikaze, a Sword Beast capable of robbing Spirit Energy from others. With their time to manifest as physical entities reaching its limits, the Zanpakuto are determined to carry out their last mission to defeat Kirikaze.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Evolution?! Die Bedrohung durch die letzte Schwertbestie
Progress!? The Last Sword Fiend Threat!
Shinka!? Saigo no Toujuu no Kyoui!
Évolution ?! La merveille du final des épées bestiales
進化!? 最後の刀獣の脅威!
